import React from "react" class RestaurantCard extends React.Component{ state = { date: "2020-11-13", time: "19:00", guests: "2" } changeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } render() { return( <>

{this.props.restaurant.restaurant.name}

{this.props.restaurant.restaurant.cuisines}

{this.props.restaurant.restaurant.location.address}



)} } export default RestaurantCard
